titles: Exceeding good nevvs from Nottingham, and Yorkeshire. Being a true relation of all that hath passed there since the removing of the army from Beverly to Nottingham. VVith the number of arms and ammunition that is carried to the common hall in Yorke. Being sent in a letter from Mr. Gifford to a private friend in London.
author: Gifford, A.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
